message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $120. I think it's a great value and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you trying to work with me, but $120 is still a bit too high for me right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $105?
Hi Bob, I understand where you're coming from, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $105 just yet. How about we compromise at $115? I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.
